TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Parupu, title = Parupu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parupu} }

S.FORM: Parupu Itiniay i Guanshan Cen no Taitung ko Parupu a niyaro', 158 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 446 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 64% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 284 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 36% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 59%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 2%, roma 2%.

Paropo Itiniay i Goanshan Cen no Taitong ko Paropo a niyaro', 158 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 446 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 64% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 284 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 36% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 59%, Tayal 1%, Bonon 2%, roma 2%.
